forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 5pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. West southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As you wake to the tranquil hum of the city, the air holds a hint of something more ebullient than dawn. A slight chill lingers, with temperatures whispering around 48 degrees. A delicate veil of clouds dances above, hinting at the day's potential for rain later this morning—though still just a tease, with a mere twenty percent chance promising little more than a misty kiss. The westward breeze carries a gentle promise, stirring the air between the hills and valleys of San Francisco, merging its cool breath with the awakening cityscape.

Throughout the day, expect a return to the sun's embrace, with those fleeting moments of rain giving way to mostly sunny skies. The afternoon temperature will nudge up to a crisp 58 degrees as the sun bathes the streets in a warm, golden hue. The skyline stands proud against the horizon, possibly shrouded in a thin marine layer, but clarity will dominate as the day unfolds. Dress in layers—a light jacket to fend off the morning chill will suffice, while a comfortable sweater serves as an ally against the cooler moments that linger in the shade. 

With the day promising a blend of activities—perhaps a stroll through the serene pathways of Golden Gate Park or a languid exploration of the less-traveled streets of the Mission District, bask in the local charm over a coffee from a nearby café. Let the evolving weather draw you out, allowing you to chart your course as you embrace the gentle pulse of this vibrant city.
